SELECT c.*, u.username FROM ai_tutor_conversation c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.id
c.deleted = 0
AND ( u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.topic LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND c.role = #{role}
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ai_tutor_conversation WHERE deleted = 0) as totalMessages, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) FROM ai_tutor_conversation WHERE deleted = 0) as activeSessions, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ai_tutor_conversation WHERE deleted = 0 AND role = 'user' AND create_time >= #{todayStart}) as todayQuestions
